fd_greens.main.eh_states_solver module

(N+/-1)-electron states solver.

class fd_greens.main.eh_states_solver.EHStatesSolver(h: fd_greens.main.molecular_hamiltonian.MolecularHamiltonian, ansatz_func_e: Callable[[Sequence[float]], qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit] = <function build_ansatz_e>, ansatz_func_h: Callable[[Sequence[float]], qiskit.circuit.quantumcircuit.QuantumCircuit] = <function build_ansatz_h>, q_instance: Optional[qiskit.utils.quantum_instance.QuantumInstance] = None, spin: str = 'd', method: str = 'exact', h5fname: str = 'lih')

Bases: object

A class to calculate and store information of (N+/-1)-electron states.

run_exact() → None

Calculates the exact (N+/-1)-electron energies and states of the Hamiltonian.

run_vqe() → None

Calculates the (N+/-1)-electron energies and states of the Hamiltonian using VQE.

save_data() → None

Saves (N+/-1)-electron energies and states to HDF5 file.

run(method: Optional[str] = None) → None

Runs the (N+/-1)-electron states calculation.

Parameters

exact (The method to calculate the excited states. Either) –
